title: Need help with switching right to left mousebutton PLS!!!!
body: I switched the right to left button on the mouse via the persistedSettings.json when I go ingame I can move and AA via left click but when I wanna do a skillshot via Normalcast it doesnt work, so when I press Q on normalcast the normal thing appears on the ground but when I click left click it doesnt cast the ability pls help me.

replies.body: The left and right click are reserved bindings and can't currently be swapped.  Modifying game files could end up causing you issues, but you can reach out to our tech team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we can do anything for this.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
I don't think this can be done through league, but Windows might have an option to swap mouse buttons, if I recall correctly.
